text: Dr. Julius No is a fictional character and the major villain in the 1958 James Bond novel and its 1962 movie version Dr. No, the first of the series, in which he was portrayed by actor Joseph Wiseman. He is a Chinese-German villain who works with SPECTRE and Ernst Stavro Blofeld. He is seen as a mad nuclear scientist. ==References== Category:Characters in written fiction Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1950s Category:Fictional criminals Category:Fictional European people Category:Bond villains Category:Mad scientists
title: Julius No
